sections.heading: I, II, or III school district; school board; board of education; members; number
sections.text: (1) Except as otherwise provided in section 79-550, the school board or board of education of a Class I, II, or III school district shall consist of six members.(2) In addition to the members specified in subsection (1)

79-547.Class I, II, or III school district; school board; board of education; members; number.

(1) Except as otherwise provided in section 79-550, the school board or board of education of a Class I, II, or III school district shall consist of six members.

(2) In addition to the members specified in subsection (1) of this section, such school boards or boards of education may include one or more student members selected pursuant to section 79-559.

SourceLaws 1969, c. 257, § 37, p. 951;Laws 1982, LB 440, § 2;R.S.1943, (1994), § 79-516.04;Laws 1996, LB 900, § 300;Laws 2014, LB946, § 40;Laws 2018, LB377, § 37;Laws 2024, LB1329, § 42.
